name: EAT or FIGHT
description:
Dee Luscious is here to FIGHT delicious monstergirls... Or, to EAT them instead ;)
Have fun in the Magicalorical Forest!
FIREFOX browser recommended!
All instructions are inside the game :)

Play EAT or FUCK, the ❤️SEXtended Edition❤️ at
https://www.patreon.com/peninja !

EAT or FIGHT is a minigame for the next version of our current game 'Pigglet in Mrs. Big Bad Werewolf'
https://teamtailnut.itch.io/mrsbigbadwerewolf0285
Have fun playing, taste you later, and stay funky!
Tailnut devs Dezue & OniGiri
